name: TiktaalikDreamings Realistic Weapon Pack ReBuilt
description:
Intended to add some vaguely more realistic weapons from history instead of the very fantasy cliche things in the game.  

A list of Items is here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZiykgA4npQV8E5ynbByaZqwU-8l45EgR/view?usp=sharing

Mod discord here https://discord.gg/XEUZxZRVF9
changeNote:
Tidied up some details of the stick collection, descriptions, removing DLC auto-learning, etc  Removing some test assets bloating the mod.  Fixing the blueprint on the "pointy stick", and all the tags on all the things (some were fine, but a lot were missing)
AKA, tidy up for pre-3.0, seeing as the devkit is about to be 3.0'ed
author: Tiktaalik Dreaming
